name: 沃克·奥杜根
introduction: Straight out of high school in Richmond, Indiana, Walker entered the United States Marine Corps. After serving in Viet-Nam, and after recovering from his wounds, he attended college and immediately went back into the Marine reserves as a Commissioned Officer. He retired as a Major. While serving in the reserves he worked in law enforcement. and worked as a part-time actor.After retirement from Law Enforcement and the Marines, he devoted more time to the movie industry. Since then he has worked as a Law Enforcement advisor, a Military Advisor, a Producer, and a Writer, along with a supporting actor in several movies and television productions.
